description: Grade 7 / Junior High Year 1 (Transition from Primary to Secondary)
curriculum_standard: Based on 2022 National Curriculum Standards (Level 3 Start)

topic_coverage.summary: Focus on self, family, school life, and basic social interactions.

categories.name: Category 1: Man & Self (Personal Life)
sub_topics: Daily Routine (Getting up, School schedule, Weekend activities)
example_prompts: A Letter to a Pen Pal

categories.name: Category 2: Man & Society (School & Friends)
sub_topics: Rules (School rules, Library rules, Home rules)
Friendship (My best friend, Helping each other)

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 500-800 words. Describe daily life using simple sentences.
phrase_bank: get up / go to school / go home

complex_structures: Wh-questions (What / Where / When / Why / Who / How)
Prepositions of Place (in, on, under, behind, next to)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Simple Subject-Verb-Object sentences. Compound sentences with 'and', 'but', 'so'.

writing_standards.complexity: Clear paragraph structure. Use of linking words (first, second, finally).
writing_standards.structure: Simple paragraph structure: Leading sentence -> Supporting details -> Ending sentence.
writing_standards.cohesion: Use basic linking words: And, But, So, Then, First.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Correct spelling, correct basic grammar (Subject-Verb Agreement), clear handwriting.
